mapper.select: select ms.id storeId, case when ms.name is null then '' else ms.name end name, case when ms.intro is null then '' else ms.intro end intro, case when msi1.path is null then '' else msi1.path end logo_url, case when msi2.path is null then '' else msi2.path end store_url from merchant_store ms left join merchant_store_image msi1 on msi1.merchant_store_id=ms.id and msi1.type=3 left join merchant_store_image msi2 on msi2.merchant_store_id=ms.id and msi2.type=1 where ms.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
